Description: Rim fragment of a pottery plate; on top of rim frieze of staggered rectangles filled with dashes; broad band at edge of floor, narrower one inside; floor reserved as far as preserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.788)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: II T 1 (de Jong note book)
